Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Meropenem for Streptococcus pneumoniae
VITEK 2 AST-GP Meropenem for Streptococcus pneumoniae
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 Gram Positive Meropenem for Streptococcus pneumoniae antimicrobial susceptibility testing system
Indications for Use Summary: Designed for quantitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus pneumoniae, intended for use with VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact Systems as a laboratory aid in determination of in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents
